---
title: "GeoPoints"
---
<!-- DO NOT EDIT! This file was auto-generated by crates/build/re_types_builder/src/codegen/docs/mod.rs -->

Geographical points with positions expressed in EPSG:4326 altitude and longitude, and optional colors and radii.

## Components

**Required**: [`LatLon`](../components/lat_lon.md)

**Recommended**: [`Radius`](../components/radius.md), [`Color`](../components/color.md)

## Shown in
* [MapView](../views/map_view.md)
* [DataframeView](../views/dataframe_view.md)
